title: Fun Worries
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Hmm.... Chika, between this one and this one, which do you think fits their image?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Let’s see, I would say~.... Wait, don’t you know Honoka-chan and Kotori-chan a lot more than me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>T-, that may be so, but.... Umm, it’s an annual thing, and since you’re accompanying me to choose a present, I figured I’d like to hear your opinion as well, Chika<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Aaah~, I guess I get what you feel! Then, can I ask you too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Of course<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I thought of getting matching pairs of these fluffy socks in different colors but, which pattern do you think is good?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>T-, that’s certainly a good question.... All the patterns look cute, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hmm, you’re right. It’s really hard to decide~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Me too.... This will be a long battle. Let’s have a cup of tea and think it over<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah, let’s do that! I want to drink hot chocolate!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
